mil7.6.10:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘ajagarassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.6.10:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, ajagaro mahatimahākāyo bahūpi divase ūnūdaro dīnataro kucchipūraṁ āhāraṁ na labhati, aparipuṇṇo yeva yāvadeva sarīrayāpanamattakena yāpeti;
mil7.6.10:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogino yogāvacarassa bhikkhācariyappasutassa parapiṇḍamupagatassa paradinnappāṭikaṅkhissa sayaṅgāhappaṭiviratassa dullabhaṁ udaraparipūraṁ āhāraṁ, api ca atthavasikena kulaputtena cattāro pañca ālope abhuñjitvā avasesaṁ udakena paripūretabbaṁ.
mil7.6.10:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, ajagarassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
